greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1, a(n) = (denominator of the Bernoulli number B_{2n})/3, for n>=1.
comment: All terms except a(0) are odd multiples of 2, by the von Staudt-Clausen theorem. See A002445 and A027642 for comments, references, and links.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_, Dec 12 2016
